So, I bought this before Christmas (my mum gave me the money, it was her gift to me), I was really excited to use it, so was my son, and it broke on Christmas Day. It worked perfectly for 2 cups of coffee, then for some reason just wouldn't turn on. I had loads of coffee pods so didn't want a refund, I returned easily and the new one came in 2 days. I do love it, I love the Costa coffee range in particular, but there are a few hang ups;
1. The noise! It is a loud machine, my next door neighbour can hear it even though it is not touching the connecting wall.
2. The new one has just started making a funny noise and I'm nervous in case this one breaks, I'm not sure if I would buy another.
3. It doesn't have room for a large latte glass. You have to take off the drip tray and even then its a close fit.
4. I wish there were more flavours! I like the sweet ones, like caramel macchiatto, but there aren't many to choose from at all.
Overall, I do love my coffee machine but I'm not blind to its flaws. Buy cautiously.
